title: Cory Monteith
summary: Cory Allan Michael Monteith (/mɒnˈtiːθ/; May 11, 1982 –  July 13, 2013) was a Canadian actor and musician best known for his role as Finn Hudson on the Fox television series Glee. As an actor based in British Columbia, Monteith had minor roles on television series before being cast on Glee. During his success on the show, he also acted in films. His film work included Monte Carlo and a starring role in Sisters & Brothers (both 2011).
